resources.string: Enter command here. To run \"ffmpeg -version\" enter \"-version\"
FFmpeg is not supported on your device
Please select videos with same resolution.
If videos merged successfully, it will automatically play below.
If audio added successfully, video will automatically play below.
If text added successfully, video will automatically play below.
If image cropped successfully, it will automatically show below.
If animation added successfully, video will automatically play below.
